```{r}
Curry <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/centerandspread/centerandspread.github.io/master/data/Curry.csv")
```

A list of general descriptives.

```{r}
summary(Curry)
```

Stephen Curry's 3-point shooting percentage for each game in the 2016-2017 season. Is he streaky, or consistent? How can you tell?

```{r}
print(Curry$X3P_PCT)
```

A histogram can help us "see" this data a whole lot better.

```{r}
hist(Curry$X3P_PCT)
```
